juzs.text: [Iʙrohim] Guft: «Ej faristagon [-i Alloh taolo], koru ma'murijati sumo cist?»
[Faristagon] Guftand: «Mo ʙaroi [mucozoti] qavme mucrim [va gunahkor] firistoda sudaem
To sanghoe az gil [-i saxtsuda] ʙar sarason furu ʙorem
[Sanghoe] Ki nazdi Parvardigorat ʙaroi isrofkoron nison guzosta sudaast
Pas, mu'minonero, ki dar on [sahrhoi qavmi Lut] ʙudand, [pes az nuzuli azoʙ] ʙerun ovardem
Vale faqat jak xonavodaro joftem, ki [nisʙat ʙa avomiri ilohi] taslim ʙudand
Va dar on [sahrho] ʙaroi mardume, ki az azoʙi dardnok [-i ilohi] tars dorand, nisonae ravsan ʙar coj guzostem
Dar [dostoni] Muso [niz nisona va iʙratest]; on goh ki uro ʙo dalele ravsan nazdi Fir'avn firistodem
Vale [Fir'avn] ʙo takja ʙar qudratas [haqro] napaziruft va guft: [«In mard jo] Codugar ast jo devona»
Uro hamroh ʙo sipohijonas giriftem va ʙa darjo afkandem [va halok kardem]; dar hole ki [dar lahzai marg xudro ʙa xotiri nofarmoni va kufras] sarzanis mekard
Dar [dostoni qavmi] Od [niz darsi iʙratest]; on goh ki tundʙode ʙe xajru ʙarakat ʙar onon firistodem
[Tundʙode] Ki ʙar har ciz vazid, xoku xosokas kard
Dar [dostoni qavmi] Samud [niz darsi iʙrate ast] on goh ki [tavassuti pajomʙarason Soleh] ʙa onon gufta sud: «Andake [az lazzathoi zindagi] ʙahramand saved [ki tanho se ruz fursat dored]»
Onon az farmoni Parvardigorason sarpeci kardand; pas, dar hole ki [ʙa casmi xud azoʙro] medidand, soiqa ononro faro girift
[Cunon ʙar zamin aftodand, ki] Na tavoni ʙarxostan [va gurez] dostand va na joroi difo
Pes az on qavmi Nuhro, ki guruhe nofarmon ʙudand [halok kardem]
Mo osmonro ʙa tavon [-i xud] ʙino nihodem va hamvora onro vus'at meʙaxsem
Va zaminro [ʙaroi zindagi] gusturdem va ci nek gusturonandae hastem
Va hama cizro ʙa surati zavc [cuft] ofaridem; ʙosad, ki [tavaccuh kuned va] pand gired
[Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa mardum ʙigu:] «Pas, ʙa suji Alloh taolo ʙistoʙed, ki man az coniʙi U ʙaroi sumo husdordihandae oskoram
Va dar kanori Alloh taolo ma'ʙudi digare qaror nadihed, jaqinan, man az [coniʙi] U ʙaroi sumo husdordihandae oskoram»
Har pajomʙare, ki ʙar pesinijonason maʙ'us sud, hamin guna guftand: «[U jo] Codugar ast jo devona»
Ojo jakdigarro ʙa in [kufru takziʙ] suporis karda ʙudand? Na, ʙalki mardume sarkas ʙudand
Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az onon ruj ʙigardon, ki tu [ʙa xotiri kufri onon] hargiz sazovori sarzanis nesti
Va [pajvasta ʙa onon] tazakkur ʙideh, ki, hatman, tazakkur ʙaroi mu'minon sudʙaxs ast
Va cinnu insro faqat ʙaroi in ofaridam, ki Maro iʙodat kunand [va az ʙandagii digaron sar ʙoz zanand]
Na az onon ruzi mexoham, na in ki Maro xurok dihand
[Zero] Alloh taolo ast, ki ruzirasoni nerumand va ʙarqaror ast
Sitamgoron [-i musrik niz] hamcun joron [-i guzasta]-i xes sahme az azoʙ dorand; pas, ʙa sitoʙ [onro] az Man naxohand
Pas, voj ʙar kofiron az [azoʙi] ruzi mav'udason
Savgand ʙa kuhi Tur
va savgand ʙa kitoʙi navistasuda
Dar sahifahoi kusuda
Va savgand ʙa «Bajtu-l-ma'mur» [ki faristagon dar on ʙa iʙodati Parvardigor masƣuland]
Va savgand ʙa [osmoni ʙaland hamon] saqfi ʙarafrosta [ʙar zamin]
Va savgand ʙa darjoi oganda [az oʙ]
Ki ʙe tardid, azoʙi Parvardigorat ʙa vuqu' xohad pajvast
Va hec ʙozdorandae onro ʙoznadorad
Ruze, ki osmon ʙa saxti dar cunʙis va iztiroʙ aftad
Va kuhho ʙa harakate sadid ravon savand
Dar on ruz voj ʙa holi takziʙkunandagon
Hamon kasone, ki dar ʙehudagui sargarmi ʙoziand
Ruze, ki ʙo xusunat ʙa suji otasi duzax ronda mesavand
[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «In [hamon] otasest, ki onro duruƣ mepindosted
Ojo in [otasu azoʙi] codust jo [hanuz ham onro] nameʙined
Ba otas daroed [va ʙisuzed], ki sikeʙoi va nosikeʙoii sumo [dar ʙaroʙari su'lahoi suzonas] ʙarojaton jakson ast; tanho dar ʙaroʙari on ci kardaed, mucozot mesaved»
Ba rosti, ki parhezkoron dar ʙoƣhoi ʙihist dar nozu ne'matand
Va az ʙaxsishoi [ʙedareƣi] Parvardigorason va az in ki az azoʙi duzax nigohason dostaast, sodmonand
[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Ba podosi kirdoraton [dar dunjo inak] guvoro ʙixured va ʙiosomed»
Dar hole ki ʙar taxthoe radifsuda takja zadaand va huroni ƣizolcasmro ʙa hamsarii onon darmeovarem

Mu'minone, ki farzandonason dar imon pajravi onon ʙudand, farzandonasonro [niz dar ʙihist] ʙa onon mulhaq xohem kard va az [podosi] amalason zarrae namekohem; caro ki [sarnavisti] har kas dar garavi dastovardi xudi ust
[Dar ʙihist az] Har nav' meva va guste, ki ʙixohand, pajdarpaj dar dastrasason qaror medihem
Dar on co comhoi saroʙe az dasti jakdigar megirand, ki na muciʙi ʙehudagui ast va na gunoh
Va navcavonone [ki ʙaroi xidmat] peromunason dar raftu omadand, gui [az zeʙoi va sapedrui] hamcun marvoride dar sadaf hastand
[Bihistijon] Ba jakdigar ru meovarand va az [dunjo va ahvoli guzastai] xud suol mekunand
Megujand: «Mo dar dunjo dar xonavodai xud [az azoʙi ilohi] metarsidem
Alloh taolo [ʙo ne'mti islom] ʙar mo minnat nihod va az azoʙi suzon [-i duzax] hifzamon kard
Mo dar zindagii dunjo hamvora Uro [parastis mekardem va ʙa ruʙuʙijat] mexondem. Be tardid, U nakukoru mehruʙon ast
Pas, [ej Pajomʙar, ʙo ojoti Qur'on ʙa mardum] andarz ʙideh, ki ʙa lutfi Parvardigorat [tu ʙar xilofi iddaoi kofiron] na kohini va na macnun
Ojo megujand: «[Muhammad] Soirest, ki muntazirem, to margas faro rasad [va az suxanonas rahoi joʙem]?»
Bigu: «Muntazir [-i margi man] ʙosed; man niz ʙo sumo muntazir xoham mond [to azoʙatonro ʙa casm ʙinam]»
Ojo aqlhojason ʙa [ʙajoni] in [suxanoni ʙotil] hukm mekunad, jo [asosan] mardume sarkas hastand
Ojo megujand: «[Muhammad] Qur'onro ca'l kardaast?». [Hargiz cunin nest] Balki [ƣarq dar takaʙʙurand, ki] imon nameovarand
Agar rost megujand, suxane monandi on ʙijovarand
Ojo onon az hec ofarida sudaand jo xud ofarinandai xesand
Ojo onon osmonho va zaminro ofaridaand? [Na] Balki onon jaqin nadorand [ki Alloh taolo ofarinandai mutlaq ast]
Ojo gancinahoi [ne'mat va hidojati] Parvardigorat nazdi eson ast? Ojo [ʙar hama ciz] tasallut dorand
Ojo nardʙone dorand, ki ʙa vasilai on [guftori faristagoni vahjro] mesunavand? Pas, har ki sunidaast, ʙojad dalele ravsan ʙijovarad
Ojo Alloh taolo farzandoni duxtar dorad va sumo pisar
[Ej pajomʙar] Ojo az onon podose darxost mekuni, ki [az pardoxtas dar rancand va xarcas] ʙarojason [garonu] sangin ast
Ojo az ilmi ƣajʙ ogohand va [xaʙarhoi nihonro] menavisand
Ojo qasdi najrang[va naqsai palide ʙarojat] dorand? Vale kofiron xud giriftori najrang [va tadʙiri ilohi] hastand
Ojo onon ma'ʙude ƣajr az Alloh taolo dorand? Alloh taolo az on ci ʙo U sarik qaror medihand, poku munazzah ast
[In kofiron, hatto] Agar porae az osmonro niz dar holi suqut ʙuʙinand, [ʙoz ham imon nameovarand va] megujand: «Aʙre mutarokim ast»
Pas, ononro [ʙa holi xud] raho kun, to ʙo ruzi mav'udason, ki [ʙo naxustin damidani sur] madhusi marg megardand, muvoceh savand
Ruze, ki najrangason sudmand naxohad ʙud va [az hec su] jori namesavand
Sitamgoron [dar dunjo niz ʙa dasti mu'minon] ʙa azoʙi digare giriftor xohand sud; vale ʙestarason namedonand
[Ej Pajomʙar] Dar ʙaroʙari hukmi Parvardigorat sikeʙo ʙos; zero tu tahti nazar va hifozati Moi; va hangome ki [az xoʙ jo ʙa qasdi iʙodat] ʙarmexezi, Parvardigoratro ʙa poki sitois kun
Va niz [dar pose] az saʙ Uro sitois kun [va namoz ʙiguzor] va ʙa hangomi nopadid sudani sitoragon [dar sapedadam niz namozi suʙh ʙiguzor]
Savgand ʙa sitora, on goh ki nopadid savad
Ki jori sumo [Muhammad] hargiz gumroh nasuda va ʙa rohi taʙohe naaftodaast
Va az ruji havoi nafs suxan namegujad
[In Qur'on] Vahj [-i ilohi] ast, ki [ʙa u] ilqo mesavad. In [Qur'on] cuz pand ʙaroi cahonijon [inson va cin] nest
[Caʙrail, ki faristae ast] Purtavon ta'limas dodaast
[Hamon faristai] Xusmanzare, ki [ʙo cehrai haqiqias dar ʙaroʙari Pajomʙar] istod
Dar hole ki u dar ufuqi ʙolo [dar osmon] qaror dost
Sipas [Caʙrail] nazdik sud; va nazdiktar
Pas, [fosilai u ʙo Pajomʙar] ʙa andozai tuli du kamon kamtar ʙud
On goh [on faristai ʙuzurgvor] on ciro, ki ʙojad ʙa ʙandai Alloh taolo vahj mekard, vahj namud
On ciro, ki [pajomʙar] did, qalʙas duruƣ napindost
Ojo ʙo u dar ʙorai on ci meʙinad, mucodala mekuned
Dar haqiqat, pajomʙar jak ʙori digar niz on faristaro [ʙa surati komil] musohida karda ʙud
Dar kanori [daraxti ʙuzurg] «Sidratu-l-muntaho» [dar osmoni haftum]
ki oromisgohi ʙihist hamon cost
On goh ki holate on daraxtro pusonida ʙud
Casmi [pajomʙar ʙa capu rost] munharif nasud va [az had] tacovuz nakard
Ba rosti, ki u ʙarxe az ʙuzurgtarin nisonahoi Parvardigorasro [dar on co] musohida kard
[Ej musrikon] Ojo «Lot»-u «Uzzo»-ro didaed
Va «Mannot» on savumin [ʙuti ʙearzis]-ro? [Ojo hec sudu zijone ʙa sumo merasonand]
Ojo [iddao mekuned, ki] farzandi pisar ʙaroi sumost va duxtar ʙaroi Alloh taolo
Dar in surat, taqsime noodilona ast

In ʙutho faqat ismhoe [ʙema'no] hastand, ki xud va padaronaton ʙo onho [ma'ʙudhoi duruƣini xudro] nom nihodaed va Alloh taolo hec dalele [ʙar haqqonijati in kor] nozil nakardaast. [Musrikon dar e'tiqodotason] Faqat pajravi gumonu xostahoi dili xesand; hol on ki [muciʙoti] hidojat az coniʙi Parvardigorason ʙar onon rasidaast
Ojo inson har ci [az safoati in ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] orzu kunad, ʙarojas mujassar ast
Dunjo va oxirat az oni Alloh ast [va ʙa har kas, har ciro saloh ʙidonad meʙaxsad]
Ci ʙisjor faristagone, ki dar osmonho hastand, ki safoatason ʙa hec vach sudmand naxohad ʙud; magar pas az on ki Alloh taolo ʙaroi har ki ʙixohad va xusnud ʙosad, icozat dihad
Kasone, ki ʙa oxirat ʙovar nadorand, ʙar faristagoni ilohi nomi duxtar meguzorand [va ononro duxtaroni Alloh taolo medonand]
Onon dar mavridi in amr [komilan] ʙeittiloand [va] faqat az hadsu gumon pajravi mekunand; dar hole ki ʙaroi [sinoxti] haqiqat gumon kofi nest
Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] tu niz az kase, ki az jodi Mo ruj gardonida va faqat [lazzathoi] zindagii dunjoro mexohad, ruj ʙartoʙ
Nihojati darku fahmason hamin ast. Be tardid, Parvardigorat ʙa holi kasone, ki az rohi U munharif sudaand ogohtar ast; va niz ʙa holi rohjoftagon

Har ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, az oni Alloh taolo ast, [rohi xajru sarro ʙa inson iroa kard] to ʙadkoronro dar ʙaroʙari raftorason kajfar dihad va nakukoronro [ʙo ne'mathoi ʙihist] podosi naku ato namojad

Hamon kasone, ki az gunohoni kaʙira va korhoi zistu ʙesarmona duri mekunand; magar laƣƶishoi kamahamijat [va gunohoni saƣira, ki ʙo tavʙa va iʙodat ʙaxsida mesavand], ki omurzisi Parvardigorat gusturda ast; az hamon dam, ki sumoro az zamin padid ovard va on goh ki ʙa surati canin dar sikami modaronaton ʙuded, ʙa [taʙiati] sumo ogohtar [az xudaton] ast; pas, xudsitoi nakuned, ki U ʙa holi parhezkoron donotar ast
Ojo on kasero, ki [az haq] ruj ʙartoft, didai
Va andake infoq kard va [sipas] xuddori namud
Ojo ilmi ƣajʙ dorad va [ojandaro] meʙinad
Ojo ʙoxaʙar nasudaast az matoliʙi kitoʙi osmonii Muso
va [ta'limoti] Iʙrohim, ki haqqi [risolat va ʙandagii Mo]-ro ʙa tamomi ado kard
Ki hec gunahgore ʙori gunohi digarero ʙar dus naxohad kasid
Va in ki inson faqat samarai talos [-u nijati] xudro xohad dost
Va in ki ʙe gumon talosi u [dar muhosiʙai a'molas dar ruzi qijomat] manzur xohad sud
On goh podosasro ʙa tamomi xohand dod
Va in ki ʙozgast [-i hamai umur] ʙa suji Parvardigori tust
Va Ust, ki mexandonad va megirjonad
Va Ust, ki memironad va [dar oxirat] zinda mekunad
Va ham Ust, ki zavci naru modaro meofarad
az nutfae, ki [dar rahim] rexta mesavad
va padid ovardani duʙorai onho [dar qijomat niz ʙar uhdai] Alloh taolo ast
Va Ust, ki [sumoro] ʙenijoz mekunad va sarmoja meʙaxsad
Va Ust, ki Parvardigori [sitorai] «Si'ro» ast
Va Ust, ki qavmi Odro dar guzasta halok kard
Va qavmi Samudro [niz noʙud kard] va [hec jak az ononro] ʙoqi naguzost
Va qavmi Nuhro, ki sitamgortar va sarkastar ʙudand, pes az on [halok namud]
Va sahrhoi zerurusuda [-i qavmi Lut]-ro dar ham kuʙid
Va ononro [ʙo azoʙe farogir] – cunon ki ʙojad pusonid
Hol [ej inson] dar mavridi kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigorat tardid ravo medori [va mucodala mekuni]
In [pajomʙar niz] husdordihandaest az [guruhi] husdordihandagoni pesin
Qijomat nazdik mesavad
Va hec kas – cuz Alloh taolo – nametavonad oskoras kunad [va saxtihojasro ʙartaraf sozad]
[Ej musrikon] Ojo az in suxan dar sigifted
Va dar holi ƣaflat va ƣurur [ʙa ojoti Qur'on] mexanded va [az sunidani husdorhojas nametarsed va] ask namerezed
Va sumo ʙozikunandagoned
Pas, [hamagi] ʙaroi Alloh taolo sacda kuned va [tanho] Uro ʙiparasted
Qijomat nazdik sud va moh [az ham] sikoft
Agar [kofiron] mu'cizae ʙuʙinand, ru megardonand va megujand: «[In] Codue [ʙotilu] zudguzar ast»
Onon [ojot va nisonahoi ilohiro] duruƣ mepindorand va az havoi nafsi xes pajravi mekunand; va har amre [az podosu kajfarhoi qijomat] dar zamoni maxsus ʙa xud qaror dorad
Va mutmainan [mocaroi azoʙi aqvomi guzasta va] axʙore, ki ʙoisi dast kasidan az gunoh mesavad, ʙa musrikon rasidaast
In [ojoti ilohi donisu] hikmate rasost; vale [ʙaroi afrodi lacuc] husdorho sude nadorad
Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] az onon ru ʙartoʙ, [va muntaziri] ruze [ʙos], ki [faristai] da'vatkunanda [ʙo damidan dar sur] ononro ʙa amre ʙas dusvor [-u vahsatnok] faro ʙixonad
Bo didagoni furuaftoda [az vahsat] az gurho xoric mesavand; [harakatason ʙa suji dodgohi ilohi cunon ast, ki] gui malaxhoe parokandaand
[Harosnok] Ba suji munodi [-i mahsar] mesitoʙand va kofiron megujand: «Imruz ruzi dusvore ast»
Pes az onon niz qavmi Nuh [pajomʙarasonro] takziʙ kardand va ʙandai Moro duruƣgu xondand va guftand: «Devona ast»; va uro saxt ozurdand
Pas, u Parvardigorasro xond [va guft]: «Man maƣluʙ sudaam; pas, joriam farmo [va az onon intiqom ʙigir]»
Mo niz darhoi osmonro ʙaroi [rezisi] ʙoroni seloso kusudem
Va az zamin niz casmaho cori soxtem va oʙho [az zaminu osmon] ʙaroi tufone, ki muqaddar suda ʙud, ʙa ham pajvast
Va Nuhro ʙar [kistii] soxta va pardoxta az taxtaho va mexho savor kardem
Ki tahti nazar [va hifozati] Mo harakat mekard. In podosi kase ʙud, ki [qavmas] inkoras karda ʙudand
Mo on [kajfaru nacot]-ro nisonae [az qudrati xud] ʙar coj guzostem; ojo pandpazire hast
Pas, [ʙingared] ki azoʙu husdorhoi Man ci guna ʙud
Ba rosti, ki Qur'onro ʙaroi pand giriftan oson soxtem; ojo pandpazire hast
Qavmi Od [niz pajomʙarasonro] duruƣgu pindostand; pas, [ej ahli Makka, ʙingared, ki] azoʙu husdorhoi Man ci guna ʙud
Mo tundʙode sardu saxtro dar jak ruzi sum va tuloni ʙar onon firistodem
[Tufone vahsatnok] Ki mardumro cunon az coj mekand, ki gui tanahoi naxli resakansuda ʙudand
Pas, [ʙingared] ki azoʙu husdorhoi Man ci guna ʙud
Ba rosti, ki Qur'onro ʙaroi pand giriftan oson soxtem; ojo pandpazire hast
Qavmi Samud [niz] husdorkunandagonro duruƣgu pindostand
Onon guftand: «Ojo [sazovor ast] ʙasare az mijoni xudamonro pajravi kunem? Dar on surat dar gumrohi va sardargumi xohem ʙud
Ojo az mijoni hamai mo tanho ʙar u vahj nozil sudaast? [Cunin nest] Balki u duruƣgue xudpisand ast»
Fardo xohand donist, ki duruƣgui xudpisand kist
[Ba Soleh guftem] «Baroi ozmoisi onon modasuture [-ro, ki darxost kardaand, az dili kuh ʙa sujason] xohem firistod; pas, muroqiʙi raftorason ʙos va [ʙar ozorason] sikeʙoi kun
Va ʙa onon e'lom kun, ki oʙi [coh] ʙajni eson [va on modasutur] sahmijaʙandi sudaast va har ki dar navʙati xud ʙojad hozir savad»
Vale onon hamdastasonro nido dodand; u niz dast ʙa kor sud va [suturro] ʙa qatl rasond
Pas, [ʙingared] ki azoʙu husdorhoi Man ci guna ʙud
Mo ʙar onon ʙongi margʙore firistodem; pas, [hamagi] hamcun gijohi xuskida [ʙozmonda az oƣilho] xurdu rez sudand
Ba rosti, ki Qur'onro ʙaroi pand giriftan oson soxtem; ojo pandpazire hast
Qavmi Lut [niz] husdordihandagonro duruƣgu pindostand
[Mo niz] Tufoni regʙore ʙar sarason firistodem [ki hamagiro halok kard]; magar xonavodai Lut, ki sahargohon nacotason dodem
[In nacot] Ne'mate az coniʙi Mo ʙud; va ʙa har ki siposguzori kunad, in guna podos medihem
Lut ononro az kajfari [saxti] Mo ʙim dod; vale onon dar ʙaroʙari husdorho ʙa mucodala [va sitez] ʙarxostand
Onon az Lut xostand, ki mehmononasro [ʙaroi komcui] dar ixtijorason ʙigzorad; pas, Mo niz casmonasonro kur kardem [va guftem]: «Ta'mi azoʙu [naticai] husdorhojamro ʙicased»
Va suʙhgohon azoʙe pojdor ononro faro girift
[Va guftem] «Ta'mi azoʙu [naticai] husdorhojamro ʙicased»
Ba rosti, ki Qur'onro ʙaroi pand giriftan oson soxtem; ojo pandpazire hast
Husdordihandagon ʙa suroƣi fir'avnijon [niz] raftand
[Vale] Onon tamomii ojoti Moro duruƣ sumurdand; mo niz cunon [ki soistai Parvardigori] sikastnopaziru muqtadir [ast] azoʙason kardem
[Ej ahli Makka] Ojo kofironi sumo az onon ʙehtarand jo ʙaroi sumo amonnomae dar kitoʙhoi [osmonii pesin navistasuda] ast
Jo megujand: «Mo camoate muttahidu intiqomcu hastem»
Ba zudi [dar cangi Badr] cam'ason sikast mexurand va firori xohand sud
Va'dagohason qijomat ast, ki [nisʙat ʙa majdoni Badr ruzgore ʙisjor] saxttaru talxtar ast
Gunahgoron dar gumrohi va azoʙand

Pas, [ej cinnu ins] kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro inkor mekuned

Pas, [ej cinnu ins] kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro inkor mekuned

Pas, [ej cinnu ins] kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro inkor mekuned

Pas, [ej cinnu ins] kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro inkor mekuned
[Bihistijon] Bar ʙolisthoe saʙzu ʙistarhoe nafisu zeʙo oramidaand
Pas, [ej cinnu ins] kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro inkor mekuned
Nomi Parvardigori ʙosukuhu arcmandat ʙoʙarakatu farxunda ast
Hangome ki voqeai qijomat rux dihad
[Xohed did, ki] Dar vuqui on duruƣe nest
[Guruhero] Xor mekunad va [guruhero] raf'ati maqom meʙaxsad
On goh ki zamin ʙa saxti larzonda savad
Va kuhho ʙa tamomi mutalosi gardad
Va [hamcun] ƣuʙore parokanda savad
Va sumo ʙa se guruh taqsim saved
[Naxust] Saodatmandon [hastand]; ci saodatmandone [va ci naku cojgohe]
Va [guruhi digar] tiraʙaxton [hastand]; ci tiraʙaxtone [va ci ʙad cojgohe]
Va [savumin guruh] pesgomon, ki [dar nekiho] saʙqat giriftand
Onon muqarraʙoni [dargohi ilohi] hastand
Dar ʙoƣhoi purne'mat [-i ʙihist coj dorand]
Guruhi ʙisjore az onon dar zumrai pesinijon hastand [xoh az ummati islom jo az ummathoi guzasta]
va andake az ojandagon [va mutaaxxiron] hastand
Ki ʙar taxthoi gavharnison
ruʙarui ham takja zadaand
Navcavonone hamvora sodoʙ girdi onon [ʙa xidmat] megardand
Bo comho va kuzaho va qadahhoe az saroʙi cori
[Saroʙe] Ki az nusidanas sardard namegardand va dastxusi masti namesavand
Va az har meva [dar ixtijor dorand]
va gusti paranda, ki ʙixohand
Va hurone ƣizolcasm
Hamcun marvoridi pinhon dar sadaf
[Inho hama] Podosi a'molason ast
Dar on co [suxani] jova va gunoholud naxohand sunid
Dar on co suxane cuz salom va durud [-i faristagon va ʙihistijon] nest
Va [ammo] saodatmandon; ci saodatmandone
Dar kanori daraxtoni ʙexori sidr [hastand]
Va daraxtoni mavz ʙo xusahoi ʙarhamnisasta
Bo sojae gusturda
Va oʙi hamvora ravon
Va mevahoe farovon
ki na tamom savad va na mamnu' gardad
Va ʙistarhoi ʙarafrosta [va arzismand]
Va hamsarone, ki ʙo ofarinise viƶa padid ovardem [ki zeʙoi va cavonii covidon dorand]
Hamvora dusizaand
va savhardustone hamsinnusol hastand
[Hamai in ne'matho] Baroi saodatmandon ast
Dar ʙoƣhoi purne'mat [-i ʙihist coj dorand]
ki ʙarxe az onon dar zumrai pesinijon va ʙarxe digar dar zumrai mutaaxxiron hastand
Va [ammo] tiraʙaxton; ci tiraʙaxtone
Dar mijoni ʙodi zahrogin va oʙi cuson qaror dorand
Va sojahoe az dudi sijoh
ki na xunuk ast va na xus
Onon dar dunjo sarvatmandu sarkas ʙudand
Va ʙar gunohi ʙuzurg [-i sirk] isror mevarzidand
Va meguftand: «Ojo hangome ki murdem va xoku ustuxon sudem, ʙarangexta xohem sud
Ojo nijokoni mo niz [ʙarangexta mesavand]?»
[Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa kofiron] Bigu: «Be tardid, guzastagon va ojandagon
hama dar va'dagohi qijomat cam' xohand sud»
On goh sumo, ej gumrohoni takziʙkunanda
Hatman, az [mevai] daraxti zaqum xohed xurd
Va sikamhoro az on anʙosta mekuned
On goh ruji on oʙi cuson menused
Hamcun suturoni tasna
In paziroii onon dar ruzi cazost
Moem, ki sumoro [az hec] ofaridaem; pas, caro [ofarinisi duʙoraro] ʙovar nadored
Ojo ʙa nutfae, ki [dar rahimi hamsaronaton] merezed, tavaccuh kardaed
Ojo sumo onro meofarined jo mo ofarinandaas hastem
Mo dar mijoni sumo margro muqaddar kardem va notavon nestem
ki amsoli sumoro cojguzin [-i xudaton] kunem va sumoro ʙa gunae ki az on ʙexaʙared, [dar ofarinise nav] padid ovarem
Sumo, ki az ofarinisi naxustin ʙa ravsani ogoh sudaed, caro [ʙa jodi oxirat nameafted va] pand namegired
Ojo ʙa donahoe, ki mekored, tavaccuh kardaed
Ojo sumo hasted, ki onro merujoned jo Mo rujonandaem
Agar mexostem, xosokas mekardem; cunon ki sigiftzada saved
[Va cunon noʙudas mekardem, ki ʙigued] «Mo zijon kardaem
ʙalki hama cizro az dast dodaem
Ojo ʙa oʙe, ki menused, tavaccuh kardaed
Ojo sumo onro az aʙr furu ʙorided jo Mo furuʙorandai on hastem
Agar mexostem, onro suru talx mekardem, pas, caro sipos nameguzored
Ojo ʙa otase, ki meafruzed, tavaccuh kardaed
Ojo sumo daraxtasro ofaridaed Mo ofaridaem
Mo in otasro vasilai jodovarii [azoʙi duzax] va mojai ʙarxurdori [va rohatii] musofiron qaror dodaem
Pas, [ej Pajomʙar,] ʙa nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgat tasʙeh gu [va Uro ʙa poki jod kun]
Savgand ʙa cojgohi sitoragon
Ki agar ʙidoned, savgandi ʙuzurge ast
Ki in [guftor] Qur'one garonqadr ast
Dar lavhi mahfuz qaror dorad
Cuz faristagoni poksirat kase [onro nameʙinad] ʙa on dastrasi nadorad
Az suji Parvardigori cahonijon nozil sudaast
Ojo in suxanro saʙuk mesumored
Va ʙa coji sukri ruzihoe, ki ʙa sumo doda sudaast, onro duruƣ mepindored
On goh ki [coni nazdikonaton] ʙa gulugoh merasad
Va sumo dar on hangom nazzora mekuned
Va Mo az sumo ʙa u nazdiktarem, vale nameʙined
Agar rost megued va hargiz dar ʙaroʙari a'molaton cazo doda namesaved [va qijomate nest]
pas, caro conasro ʙoznamegardoned
Ammo agar u dar zumrai muqarraʙon ʙosad
Dar oromisu kusois va ʙihisti purne'mat ast
Va agar dar zumrai saodatmandon ʙosad
[ʙa u gufta mesavad] «Salomat va amnijat ʙar tu ʙod, ki az saodatmandon hasti»
Ammo agar az takziʙkunandagoni gumroh [va dar zumrai tiraʙaxton] ʙosad
ʙo oʙi cuson [az u] paziroi mesavad
va ʙa [otasi] duzax darmeojad
In [va'dai podos va azoʙ] jaqinan haqiqat dorad [va tardide dar on nest]
Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] ʙo [zikri] nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgat [uro] tasʙeh guj
On ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, ʙaroi Alloh taolo tasʙeh megujand; va U piruzmandi hakim ast
Farmonravoii osmonho va zamin az oni Ust; hajot meʙaxsad va marg medihad; va ʙar har kore tavonost
U azali va aʙadi ast va pajdo va nopajdo; va ʙa har cize donost

Ust, ki osmonho va zaminro dar sas ruz ofarid; on goh ʙar ars qaror girift. Har ci dar zamin nufuz mekunad jo az on ʙarmeojad va har ci az osmon furud meojad jo dar on su'ud mekunad, [hamaro] medonad; va har co, ki ʙosed, hamrohi sumost; va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekuned, ʙinost
Farmonravoii osmonho va zamin az oni Ust; va hamai umur tanho ʙa U ʙozgardonda mesavad
[Bo taƣjiri tadricii faslho] saʙro dar ruz mekasonad va ruzro dar saʙ; va U ʙa rozi dilho donost

Ba Alloh taolo va Pajomʙaras imon ovared va az amvole, ki sumoro conisin [va namojandai xud dar istifoda az onho] qaror dodaast, infoq kuned; zero afrode az sumo, ki imon ʙijovarand va infoq kunand, podosi ʙuzurge [dar pes] dorad

Caro ʙa Alloh taolo imon nameovared, hol on ki Pajomʙar sumoro faromexonad, ki ʙa Parvardigoraton imon ʙijovared? Agar ʙovar dored [ʙa jod dosta ʙosed, ki Alloh taolo dar in mavrid] az sumo pajmon giriftaast
Ust, ki ojoti ravsangare ʙar ʙandaas nozil mekunad, to sumoro az torikiho [-i kufru sirk] ʙa suji nur [-i imon] rahsipor gardonad, [zero] Alloh taolo nisʙat ʙa sumo dilsuzu mehruʙon ast

Caro dar rohi Alloh taolo infoq namekuned, hol on ki merosi osmonho va zamin az oni Alloh taolo ast? Kasone, ki pes az fathi [Makka] infoq kardand va cangidand, [ʙo digaron] ʙaroʙar nestand. Daracai onon volotar az kasonest, ki pas az fath infoq kardand va cangidand, vale Alloh taolo ʙa har du guruh nakutarin [podosho]-ro va'da dodaast va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekuned, ogoh ast
Kist, ki ʙa Alloh taolo vome naku dihad [va infoq kunad], to Alloh taolo niz onro ʙarojas candin ʙaroʙar sozad va [dar oxirat] podose foxir dosta ʙosad

[In podosi ʙuzurg dar] Ruzest, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro menigari, ki nurason pesi ru va dar samti rostason ʙa sitoʙ harakat mekunad [va ʙa onon xitoʙ mesavad]: «Imruz ʙasorati ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] ʙar sumo ʙod, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast va covidona dar on ʙa sar xohed ʙurd. In ast hamon komjoʙii ʙuzurg»

Ruze, ki mardonu zanoni munofiq ʙa mu'minon megujand: «Ba mo nazare ʙijafkaned, to partave az nuraton ʙargirem». Ba onon gufta mesavad: «Ba aqiʙ ʙozgarded va kasʙi nur kuned. On goh mijonason devore qaror megirad, ki dare dorad, daruni on [ki ʙa sui mu'minon ast] ru ʙa rahmat ast va ʙerunas [ki ʙa samti munofiqon ast] ru ʙa azoʙ ast

[Munofiqon] ʙa mu'minon megujand: «Magar mo [dar dindori va parastis] hamrohi sumo naʙudem?». Onon posux medihand: «Bale, vale sumo [ʙo durujagi va tazvir] xudro ʙa fitna andoxted [va halok karded] va dar intizor [-i sikasti mu'minon va ʙozgast ʙa sirku kufr] ʙuded va [dar ʙorai jori rasonidani Alloh taolo ʙa mu'minon] tardid dosted va orzuho [-i duruƣin] fireʙaton dod, to on ki farmon [-i margaton az coniʙi] Alloh taolo dar hole faro rasid, ki sajton sumoro dar ʙaroʙari U gustox karda ʙud»
Imruz na az sumo [munofiqon] ƣaromat mepazirand va na az kofiron. Cojgohaton otas ast, ki [ʙa rosti] soistai sumost va ci ʙad sarancome ast

Ojo hangomi on faro narasidaast, ki dilhoi mu'minon ʙa jodi Alloh taolo va kalomi haqqe, ki nozil sudaast, furutan savad va hamcun kasone naʙosand, ki qaʙlan ahli kitoʙ ʙudand va cun [az ʙi'sati pajomʙaronason] zamone tuloni ʙar onon guzast, dilhojason saxt sud va ʙisjore az onon az dinason munharif sudand
Ogoh ʙosed, ki Alloh taolo zaminro pas az xazonu xuskias zinda mesozad. [Ej mardum] Musallaman, Mo nisonaho [-i tavonu tadʙiri xud]-ro ʙaroi sumo ʙa ravsani ʙajon kardaem, ʙosad, ki ʙijandesed
Be gumon, mardonu zanone, ki infoq mekunand va ʙa Alloh taolo qarze naku medihand, savoʙason ducandon megardad va [dar oxirat] podose foxir [-u nek] xohand dost

Kasone, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va pajomʙaronas imon ovardand, rostgujon [-i rostkirdor] hastand va sahidon nazdi Parvardigorason ʙa sar meʙarand va [dar oxirat] podosu nurason mahfuz ast. Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand va ojoti Moro duruƣ sumurdand, duzaxiand

Bidoned, ki zindagii dunjo, ʙozica va sargarmi va zevar ast va faxrfurusi dar ʙaroʙari jakdigar va afzuntalaʙi dar amvolu farzandon. [In zindagi] Dar masal hamcun ʙoronest, ki gijohon [-i rujida ] az on kisovarzonro ʙa sigift meovarad; sipas [in gijohi sodoʙ] paƶmurda savad, on goh meʙini, ki zard mesavad va sipas xosok megardad va dar oxirat [nasiʙi munofiqonu kofiron] azoʙi sadid ast va [nasiʙi mu'minon] omurzisu xusnudii ilohi ast. [Dar har hol] Zindagii dunjo cize cuz [lazzatu] ʙarxurdorii foni [va fireʙanda] nest

[Ej mardum] Baroi rasidan ʙa omurzisi Parvardigoraton va ʙihiste, ki pahnoi on hamcun pahnoi osmonu zamin ast, az jakdigar pesi ʙigired. [In ʙihist] Baroi kasone omoda sudaast, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va pajomʙaronas imon ovardaand. In [podos nosi az] fazli ilohi ast, onro ʙa har ki ʙixohad [va soista ʙidonad], ato mekunad, ki Alloh taolo fazlu ʙaxsisi ʙehad dorad
Hec oseʙe dar zamin va jo dar vucudi sumo ruj naxohad dod, magar on ki pes az ecodas dar daftari [ilmi ilohi] raqam xurdaast. Ba rosti, ki in kor ʙar Alloh taolo oson ast
[In nuktaro tazakkur dodem] To ʙar on ci az dastaton meravad, afsus naxured va ʙad-on ci ʙa dast meovared, sarmast nagarded, ki Alloh taolo hec mutakaʙʙiri faxrfurusero dust namedorad
Hamon kasone, ki ʙuxl mevarzand va mardumro ʙa ʙuxl vo medorand va har ki [az infoq] ruj ʙigardonad, [ʙidonad, ki] Alloh taolo ʙenijozi sutuda ast

Mo pajomʙaroni xesro ʙo nisonahoi ravsan firistodem va hamrohason kitoʙu mizon [-i tasxisi haq az ʙotil] nozil kardem, to mardum ʙa adolat ʙarxezand. Va ohan [va soiri fuluzot]-ro padid ovardem, ki dar on ham nerue sadid vucud dorad va ham manofee ʙaroi mardum. [Cunin kardem] To Alloh taolo ʙidonad, ci kasone ʙiduni on ki Parvardigorasonro ʙuʙinand, [ʙo cangafzorhoi ohanin] U va pajomʙaronasro [dar majdonhoi cang] jori mekunand. Be tardid, Alloh taolo nerumandi sikastnopazir ast
Mo Nuh va Iʙrohimro [ʙa risolat] firistodem va dar mijoni farzandonason [mavhiʙati] pajomʙari va kitoʙ muqarrar dostem. Barxe az onon roh joftand va ʙisjore az onon nofarmoni kardand

Sipas ʙa dunʙoli onon pajomʙaroni digaramonro [maʙ'us kardem] va sipas Iso pisari Marjamro firistodem va Incilro ʙa u ato namudem va dar dili pajravonas ra'fat va mehruʙoni nihodem, vale [dunjogurezi va] rahʙonijatero, ki ʙid'at nihodand, Mo ʙar onon muqarrar nadostem va harcand hadafason calʙi xusnudii ilohi ʙud, vale haqqi onro [cunonki ʙojad] riojat nakardand. Az in ru, Mo ʙa afrode az eson, ki imon ovardand, podosasonro ato kardem, vale ʙisjore az onon [ʙa ʙeroha raftand va] nofarmon ʙudand

Ej mu'minon, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va ʙa pajomʙaras [xolisona] imon ʙijovared, to Alloh taolo az rahmati xes ʙahrai ducandon ʙa sumo ato namojad va ʙarojaton nure padid ovarad, ki dar partavi on gom ʙardored va sumoro ʙiʙaxsojad. Ba rosti, ki Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast

[Inro ʙajon kardem] To ahli kitoʙ ʙidonand, ki ʙa fazlu ʙaxsisi ilohi dastrasi nadorand [va nametavonand onro ʙa kase ixtisos dihand jo az kase ʙozdorand] va in ki tamomi ʙartari ʙa dasti Alloh taolo ast va ʙa har ki ʙixohad [va soista ʙidonad] ato mekunad. Be gumon, Alloh taolo fazlu ʙaxsisi ʙehad dorad
